meanings.definition: A scented ointment applied to the hair to give it a shiny, slick appearance.
meanings.sent1: She applied a little pomade to her hair before going out.
meanings.sent2: The barber recommended using pomade for a classic hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: The pomade smelled like fresh flowers and made her hair sparkle.
meanings.sent4: His hair, slicked back with pomade, gleamed under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The pomade transformed her dull hair into a glossy mane.

meanings.definition: To style the hair with pomade.
meanings.sent1: He decided to pomade his hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: She pomaded her hair into a neat bun for the interview.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over the pomade while he was trying to style his hair.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity pomaded her hair into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The magician pomaded his hair and it stayed perfectly in place throughout the show.
